attributes.action: Ban the sale of all fireworks in the public domain.
attributes.additional_details: Protect ex servicemen and women farm animals and pets from the stress that fireworks cause. Not just on the 5th of November but the weeks leading up to ans weeks beyond that date. This should also include Christmas and new year.
attributes.background: In the interested of the dispositions of ex service men and women, farm animals and pets we should ban the sale of fireworks to the general public. Allowing on organised displays on the 5th of November.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
